Package de.jhh4.logic

package de.jhh4.logic
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    IslandMaker
    this class makes terrain grids as a basis for map creation the first dimension represents the rows the second dimension represents the columns meaning: Tile[y][x]
    LogicCenter
    provides references to the logic objects which handle the game progress
    PieceMover
    places and moves pieces across the island.
    RealEstateManager
    knows where all the towns are and collects resources from them
    ResourceCollector
    collects resources from tiles
    ScoreCounter
    keeps track of the score attained throughout the game currently stone is treated as gold and used for scoring purposes this can be changed in future versions
    Storage
    TODO update to enum Ressources in version 2 stores the collected ressources
    TurnCounter
    records which turn it is
    TurnManager
    manages the increase in turns and score when pressing the "next turn" button
